sentence.Network_en: It was these lush fields and rich cities that the Tartars sought.
sentence.Network_cn: 那里物产丰富,城市繁华,正是鞑靼垂涎的目标.

sentence.Network_en: The Tartars employed another weapon, the so - called Chinese dragon belching fire.
sentence.Network_cn: 鞑靼人使用了另一种武器, 所谓 中国龙喷火器.

sentence.Network_en: Despite being sacked and burnt by the invading Tartars in the next century.
sentence.Network_cn: 尽管在十三世纪里历经了鞑靼人入侵的劫掠和烧毁.

entry.def: Tartar is a hard yellowish substance that forms on your teeth and causes them to decay if it is not removed.

entry.tran: 凶悍的人，脾气暴戾的人;(尤指)悍妇
entry.def: If you describe someone, especially a woman in a position of authority, as a tartar, you mean that they are fierce, bad-tempered, and strict.

example.ex: She can be quite a tartar.

auth_sentence.content: Giants of his size were very rare among Mongolian Tartars.
auth_sentence.res_content: Giants of his size were very rare among Mongolian Tartars.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Giants of his size were very rare among Mongolian Tartars.
